page.title: 07Pubs, Inns at Aston Clinton
page.content: There are 10 pubs in our survey area. One is the Rothschilds Arms, which received its name from the Rothschilds who lived in Halton and Aston Clinton about 120 years ago. They were bankers and built many fine houses. The names of some more pubs are the Rising Sun, the New Inn and the Robin Hood. The Bell is the most famous Inn in our area. Many famous people have stayed there and it has many exotic menus such as Crab Andaluse and Avocado Salad. The sweet Mille Feuille is strawberries and cream in flaky pastry. These change with the seasons. The old brewery is now part of the hotel. Prices for twin or double rooms cost between 40 and 60 pounds a night. This hotel is famous across the country for its excellent standard of cooking.
